title: How to Make a 7 Layer Meatless Tortilla Pie

steps.headline: Add the pinto beans to a medium sized bowl.
steps.description: Mash them thoroughly with a potato masher or fork. Add and stir in 1/4 cup of the Picante sauce to the pinto beans.

steps.headline: Add the remaining Picante sauce, garlic powder, cilantro, black beans, and tomato into a separate bowl.
Lay a tortilla on a pre-greased cookie or baking sheet.
steps.description:
Create the 7 layer pie with the following:
Add 3/4 cup of the pinto bean mixture and spread it evenly, to ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) from the shell edge. Sprinkle 1/4 cup of cheese. Add another tortilla shell. Spread 2/3 cup of the black bean mixture and 1/4 cup cheese. Repeat layering twice. Layer the last tortilla shell with the pinto bean mixture and any remaining cheese.

steps.headline: Cover the tortilla pie with foil and bake for 40 minutes at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Serve with additional Picante sauce and cheese.

text:
Add the pinto beans to a medium sized bowl. Mash them thoroughly with a potato masher or fork. Add and stir in 1/4 cup of the Picante sauce to the pinto beans. Add the remaining Picante sauce, garlic powder, cilantro, black beans, and tomato into a separate bowl. Mix thoroughly. Lay a tortilla on a pre-greased cookie or baking sheet. Create the 7 layer pie with the following:
Add 3/4 cup of the pinto bean mixture and spread it evenly, to ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) from the shell edge. Sprinkle 1/4 cup of cheese. Add another tortilla shell. Spread 2/3 cup of the black bean mixture and 1/4 cup cheese. Repeat layering twice. Layer the last tortilla shell with the pinto bean mixture and any remaining cheese. Cover the tortilla pie with foil and bake for 40 minutes at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).  Serve with additional Picante sauce and cheese.
